Title: Heathrow airport shutdown creates travel chaos
Description:
London’s Heathrow airport has shut down after having its power crippled by an immense fire at a nearby electrical substation, throwing thousands of global flights into chaos.
Heathrow announced that it will remain closed until at least midnight on Friday “to …

Title: Watch: Acrid smoke and empty runways - the scene at Heathrow
Description: The BBC's Charlotte Gallagher reports from Heathrow Airport which is going to be closed all day.

Title: The switch from Google Assistant to Gemini might kill Nest speakers and displays
Description:
Google Nest products have historically been low-powered, affordable smart home devices.
If Google Assistant is ditched for Gemini, they'll be changed forever.

Title: The Pixel 8a is still a great smartphone choice, and here's why
Description: If I needed a new phone, I'd buy another Pixel 8a, and the release of the Pixel 9a won't change that.

Title: Education Dept. cuts could hurt low-income schools. And, an entertainment rundown
Description:
President Trump signed an executive action yesterday to start shutting down the Education Department, which could hurt low-income and rural schools.
And, this week's new music, movies and books.

Title: Families of deported Venezuelans dispute gang claims after deportations under Alien Enemies Act
Description:
NPR talked to the families of four men believed to be in El Salvador.
None of them had a serious criminal record in the U.S.
Only some had been charged with illegal entry.
Three had signed their voluntary departure.

Title: European military leaders discuss Ukraine peacekeeping force
Description:
The number of troops that would help enforce a peace in Ukraine is vague.
Officials have cited figures of between 10,000 and 30,000 troops as part of what's been termed a "reassurance force."

Title: Investors are now preparing for stagflation — one of the worst-case scenarios for the US economy
Description:
The specter of stagflation sends a chill running down any investor's spine.
It's a toxic mix of below-trend growth and persistently high inflation.

Title: The Seneca
Description:
the Seneca a keyboard dream from the future Learn about buying from $3600 682 custom parts.
Built with two human hands.
The Seneca is my middle finger to the aesthetic homogeneity and economic over-optimization of 21st century life.
Its intricate mechanisms c…

Title: Race car driver with paraplegia tests out new hand control system
Description: A new braking system has been added to a race car driver's hand controls, allowing him to race without the use of his legs.

Title: The search system in Gmail is about to get a lot less frustrating
Description: Gmail will let you quickly find emails by preferring results based on how frequently you chat with a person, the click frequency, and how recently it arrived.

Title: Indian chemical company employees indicted for Importing of Fentanyl Precursors
Description: An India-based chemical manufacturing company and three high-level employees were charged in federal court in Washington, D.C., today related to illegally importing precursor chemicals used to make illicit fentanyl.

Title: Hit Apple TV+ drama Severance officially renewed for season three
Description:
Apple TV+ has officially renewed its hit sci-fi drama series Severance for a third season, on the heels of the second season finale dropping today.
Writing on scripts for season three has already been underway for some time.
Executive producer and directo…

Title: How Real Is Severance? The Show’s Neurosurgery Consultant Breaks Down Its Science
Description: A neurosurgeon who has acted as a consultant for Severance explains the science behind the show’s brain-altering procedure—and whether it could ever become reality.

Title: Kanzi the Bonobo, Who Learned Language and Made Stone Tools, Dies at Age 44
Description: What we learned about ape and human cognition from Kanzi the bonobo, who died this week

Title: How Tariffs Work—And What Economic Studies Show about Their Real Impact
Description:
President Donald Trump is threatening steep tariffs on virtually all imports.
Here’s what that means and what economics research suggests would be the impact

Title: What’s the Definition of a ‘Moon’?
Description: Defining the word “moon” is harder than you might think

Title: Mortgage and refinance rates today, March 21, 2025: Lowest 30-year rate in a week
Description:
These are today's mortgage and refinance rates.
After a week of gradual inclines, the 30-year mortgage rate finally dropped today.
Lock in your rate today.
